talk.utter: bluesky is ok, but we need view count for posts please !!!!!!

talk.author: did:plc:24m2jzwpynrcffcnye4sfhr6
talk.utter:
No. Keep that crap on YouTube and ecks. The only reason it's on the latter is to drive people to buy blue, because you can see your count, and fret over it not being seen. 

And all it does is encourage engagement farming on things like this.

talk.author: did:plc:24m2jzwpynrcffcnye4sfhr6
talk.utter: If people like what you're posting, they'll reply or like. Twitter didn't have public view counts for ages, and it only got worse after they were added.
